song.title: Great Giana Rastas
song.info:
I came in the bar that night And I saw her standing there. She didn't look like a Rasta, But I didn't really care. I got lost in her eyes at once And I asked her for her name. She said her name was Giana And that her life was like a game.
Ohh... Ohh...
She said she must be on her way And she left me standing there. I couldn't close my mouth, No, all I could do was stare. I never met such a girl, Never think I will meet one again, But she'll be with me in my mind And I'll keep looking just the same.
